com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.visitor

Class FindComponentsByClassVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.visitor.AbstractVisitorWithResult<List<ComponentWithContext>>
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.visitor.FindComponentsByClassVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WComponentTreeVisitor

    public class FindComponentsByClassVisitor
extends AbstractVisitorWithResult<List<ComponentWithContext>>
    A tree visitor implementation which finds components in the tree with a given class.
    Since:
    1.2.10
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    TreeUtil

        Find components of this class name excluding the root component from the search.
        Parameters:
        rootToIgnore - the root component to ignore
        className - the class name to search for. The package name may be omitted for convenience.

      • FindComponentsByClassVisitor

        public FindComponentsByClassVisitor(WComponent root,
                            String className,
                            boolean includeRoot)
        Creates a FindComponentByClassVisitor.
        Parameters:
        root - the root component being searched from.
        className - the class name to search for. The package name may be omitted for convenience.
        includeRoot - true if the root should be also be tested for a match, false if not.

      • classNamesMatch

        protected boolean classNamesMatch(String name1,
                      String name2)
        Tests two class names for equality, taking partical class names (no package given) into account.
        Parameters:
        name1 - the first class name to compare.
        name2 - the second class name to compare.
        Returns:
        true if the class names match, false otherwise.
